main event: A round, luminous object was observed in the sky over Van Nuys, California on July 21, 1948.
interesting points: The object appeared to have a bluish luminescence like a fluorescent lamp., As dusk fell, its color gradually changed to orange., Witnesses described the object as round and possibly spherical., The duration of the sighting was about an hour, with the object traveling in a vertical arc of approximately 25 degrees., Multiple witnesses, including astronomers from local observatories, reported the sighting.
witness description: Capt. Ord and his wife, who both observed the object while dining outdoors.
